events.name: Open Week - Windows Phone Hackathon!
events.about:
Join the Windows Phone Hackathon!

Mobile app development is skyrocketing, as is sales of smartphones and tablets. This provides a huge opportunity for developers. Experience first-hand how to build a Windows Phone app and network with other mobile developers!

Feel free to also join the session on Azure and get an overview of how you can build mobile apps that take advantage of the Windows Azure platform. Mobile developers will be there to show you how they take advantage of the platform. (Go to http://openweekmobile.eventbrite.com to register for the Azure session.) 

More details on the program on http://aka.ms/openweek

Places are limited so book your seat NOW!
